title: Most popular gaming related apps in the U.S. 2019 , by audience
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Million unique visitors in the y axis.
The maximum Million unique visitors 18.74 is found at Month Google Play Games and the minimum is found at EA where Month is 3.04.
The highest Month Google Play Games has 15.7 more Million unique visitors than the lowest Month EA.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million unique visitors for 30 number of Months.
The Million unique visitors is appeared to be the highest at Month Google Play Games and lowest at Month EA.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Million unique visitors in the y axis.
The maximum Million unique visitors 18.74 is found at Month Google Play Games and the minimum is found at EA where Month is 3.04.
The highest Month Google Play Games has 15.7 more Million unique visitors than the lowest Month EA.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million unique visitors for 30 number of Months.
The Million unique visitors is appeared to be the highest at Month Google Play Games and lowest at Month EA.
There is a difference of 15.7 between the maximum Month Google Play Games and minimum Month EA.
Month Google Play Games is higher than any other Months with value 18.74, followed by Pokémon GO, and Candy Crush Saga. Down to Month EA with the lowest value 3.04.
Over the past 30 Months, the Million unique visitors has declined.
Month Homescapes, and Xbox share the same value 4.35.
Considered together, the average Million unique visitors in all 30 Months is roughly 5.94.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 178.16.
